content: errata in the decrease section row 67 and 68 are listed twice the row numbering is incorrect but the pattern is fine this bag was designed to carry my sock projects the bag has a picot edge braided drawstring with puff balls or pompoms at each end of the drawstring this is knitted from the top down the bag stand roughly 6 inches high 13 inches around at the drawstring row and 17 inches around the widest part 03/28/2011 - row numbering has been corrected
